org.codehaus.groovy.runtime
Class InvokerHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.InvokerHelper

public class InvokerHelper
extends Object

A static helper class to make bytecode generation easier and act as a facade over the Invoker

Version:
$Revision: 19837 $
Author:
James Strachan
